member.name: T:OpenTK.IBindingsContext
member.summary: Provides methods for querying available functions in a bindings context.

member.name: M:OpenTK.IBindingsContext.GetProcAddress(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves an unmanaged function pointer to the specified function on the specified bindings context.
member.param: An ASCII-encoded string that defines the name of the function.
member.returns: A that contains the address of procName or IntPtr.Zero, if the function is not supported by the drivers.
member.remarks: Note: some drivers are known to return non-zero values for unsupported functions. Typical values include 1 and 2 - inheritors are advised to check for and ignore these values.

member.name: T:OpenTK.Core.Exceptions.BindingsNotRewrittenException
member.summary: Represents exceptions thrown when a binding method is called and the bindings have not been rewritten by Rewrite.exe.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Core.Exceptions.BindingsNotRewrittenException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:OpenTK.Core.Exceptions.ExtensionNotSupportedException
member.summary: Represents exceptions related to API extensions.

member.name: P:OpenTK.Core.Exceptions.ExtensionNotSupportedException.Extension
member.summary: Gets the name of the extension.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Core.Exceptions.ExtensionNotSupportedException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Core.Exceptions.ExtensionNotSupportedException.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The error message of the ExtensionNotSupportedException.

member.name: T:OpenTK.Core.Native.AutoGeneratedAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that this function is generated automatically by a tool.

member.name: P:OpenTK.Core.Native.AutoGeneratedAttribute.Category
member.summary: Gets or sets the category of this OpenGL function.

member.name: P:OpenTK.Core.Native.AutoGeneratedAttribute.EntryPoint
member.summary: Gets or sets the entry point of the OpenGL function.

member.name: P:OpenTK.Core.Native.AutoGeneratedAttribute.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets the version of this OpenGL function.

member.name: P:OpenTK.Core.Native.AutoGeneratedAttribute.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the overloader that generated this function.

member.name: T:OpenTK.Core.Native.CountAttribute
member.summary: Represents the count of a parameter.

member.name: P:OpenTK.Core.Native.CountAttribute.Count
member.summary: Gets or sets the static count.

member.name: P:OpenTK.Core.Native.CountAttribute.Parameter
member.summary: Gets or sets the deterministic parameter for this count.

member.name: P:OpenTK.Core.Native.CountAttribute.Computed
member.summary: Gets or sets the computed count.

member.name: T:OpenTK.Core.Native.MarshalTk
member.summary: Contains extra marshalling utilities that aren't available in the normal Marshal class.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Core.Native.MarshalTk.MarshalPtrToString(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Marshals a pointer to a null-terminated byte array to a new System.String. This method supports OpenTK and is not intended to be called by user code.
member.param: A pointer to a null-terminated byte array.
member.returns: A System.String with the data from .

member.name: M:OpenTK.Core.Native.MarshalTk.MarshalStringToPtr(System.String)
member.summary: Marshal a System.String to unmanaged memory. The resulting string is encoded in UTF8 and must be freed with FreeStringPtr.
member.returns: An unmanaged pointer containing the marshaled string. This pointer must be freed with FreeStringPtr.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Core.Native.MarshalTk.FreeStringPtr(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Frees a marshaled string that allocated by MarshalStringToPtr.
member.param: An unmanaged pointer allocated with MarshalStringToPtr.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Core.Native.MarshalTk.MarshalStringArrayToPtr(System.String[])
member.summary: Marshals a System.String array to unmanaged memory by calling Marshal.AllocHGlobal for each element.
member.returns: An unmanaged pointer to an array of null-terminated strings.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Core.Native.MarshalTk.FreeStringArrayPtr(System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Frees a marshaled string that allocated by MarshalStringArrayToPtr.
member.param: An unmanaged pointer allocated with MarshalStringArrayToPtr.
The length of the string array.

member.name: T:OpenTK.Core.Native.SlotAttribute
member.summary: Defines the slot index for a wrapper function. This type supports OpenTK and should not be used in user code.

member.name: F:OpenTK.Core.Native.SlotAttribute.Slot
member.summary: Defines the slot index for a wrapper function.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Core.Native.SlotAttribute.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The slot index for a wrapper function.

member.name: T:OpenTK.Core.Platform.PlatformException
member.summary: Defines a platform-specific exception.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Core.Platform.PlatformException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Core.Platform.PlatformException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A message explaining the cause for this exception.

member.name: M:OpenTK.Core.MarshalUtility.PtrToStringUTF8(System.Byte*)
member.summary: Converts a null-terminated UTF-8 string to a .
member.param: The pointer to the null-terminated UTF-8 data.
